Introduction

U-Chung, born Hwang Yoon Ha, is a South Korean retired singer.

She used to be a member of the girl group Six Bomb, which she joined in May 2015 with their reformation under Pacemaker Entertainment. She made her debut with the group on May 12, 2015 with the release of the single "Step To Me". She left the group in May 2016 due to health reasons.
